channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade -- Brocade SAnnav
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade -- Brocade SAnnav

item.title: CVE-2024-29950|2024-06-07T20:51:51.996Z -- brocade -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: The class FileTransfer implemented in Brocade SANnav before v2.3.1, v2.3.0a, uses the ssh-rsa signature scheme, which has a SHA-1 hash. The vulnerability could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-29956|2024-06-06T19:29:21.820Z -- brocade -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: A vulnerability in Brocade SANnav before v2.3.1 and v2.3.0a prints the Brocade SANnav password in clear text in supportsave logs when a user schedules a switch Supportsave from Brocade SANnav.

item.title: CVE-2024-2860|2024-05-08T01:01:54.775Z -- brocade -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: The PostgreSQL implementation in Brocade SANnav versions before 2.3.0a is vulnerable to an incorrect local authentication flaw. An attacker accessing the VM where the Brocade SANnav is installed can gain access to sensitive data inside the PostgreSQL database.
